CustomField.description: Represent the Membership Type i.e. Member for household Membership. Primary and Associate membership is decided by the 14-15 Digits in the 16 Digit Membership ID being 00 or Non 00 values. RAP comes as the value in the incoming request for RAP requests.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Represent the Membership Type i.e. Member for household Membership. Primary and Associate membership is decided by the 14-15 Digits in the 16 Digit Membership ID being 00 or Non 00 values. RAP comes as the value in the incoming request for RAP requests.
CustomField.label: Membership Type
